title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 417.4 - Vehicle speed limit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 417.4 - Vehicle speed limit

State Regulations
(a) A rate of
speed in excess of 30 miles per hour on a park road or park drive is
prohibited. (b) Where the speed
limit is reduced by signs posted by the office a rate of speed greater than
that indicated on such signs is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
417.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
